title: Aubergine puree
ingredients: ['2 whole aubergines', '1 pinch salt and pepper', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '8 spring onions', '1 small chilli', '5 tablespoons brown soft sugar', '5 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons sherry', '1 tablespoon sesame oil', '1 tablespoon coriander oil', '4 tablespoons natural yoghurt', '2 cloves garlic']
